prologue.text: You start awake, with only a flame clinging to a stonewall to provide light.Registering the cold, you find yourself sitting against a bare stonewall and floor, at the end of a passage. You try to collect your thoughts but cant remember anything, your mind goes blank eveytime you try to recall any memory.

options.text: Take some more time trying to recollect your thoughts
Clambering to your feet, you head to grab the torch and head down the passage

prologue.text: You spend a few minutes trying to form some sort of narrative. How'd you end up in this place? How long have you been here? Some fuzzy memories start surfacing.

options.text: You recall a memory of you fighting.
You recall a memory of running away from bullies

prologue.text: After a few minutes of walking, you notice a door coming up ahead to the right of the passage.
You remember your mother scolding you for attacking the school bully with...

options.text: A knife you stole from the kitchen in the teacher's lounge.
A rock you pick up on the playground.
A rock, you got from the playground, you threw at him.

prologue.text: One particular day you got in trouble with the school bully. But you managed

options.text: To avoid them by what seem like mere chance, but it seemed to be much more
To constantly avoid the bully by discretely sneaking around them.

prologue.text: Shaking yourself back to reality, you get to your feet.

options.text: head over to grab the torch and start down the passage

skills.name: Sneak
skills.description: Allows you to remain undetected while traversing

skills.name: Tracking
skills.description: Allows you to make the correct choice of path, locate a person or object and read footprints or tracks.

skills.name: Sixth-sense
skills.description: Will warn of imminent danger, can also give insight to a person or object's true purpose.

skills.name: Camouflage
skills.description: Allows you to blend in with your surroundings. In cities or towns, it allows you to look and sound like a native.

abilities.name: Replicate
abilities.description: Create free thinking clones of yourself

abilities.name: Spatial Gate
abilities.description: Teleport to any previously visited locations

abilities.name: Spatial Dash
abilities.description: Teleport to a location within set, within a range

abilities.name: Illusion Weaving
abilities.description: Allows you to target 1 or all five senses and deploy false sensations to a targeted being.

abilities.name: Mimicry
abilities.description: Allows you to mimic sound or a physical form, from past experience

abilities.name: Aero Control
abilities.description: Allows you to manipulate the air around you or enemies

abilities.name: Flame Generation
abilities.description: Allows you to create fire out of nothing.

abilities.name: Earth Generation
abilities.description: Allows you to create rock from nothing.

abilities.name: Aqua Generation
abilities.description: Allows you to create water from nothing.

options.text: Take some more time trying to recollect your thoughts
Clambering to your feet, you head to grab the torch and head down the passage
Take some more time trying to recollect your thoughts
Clambering to your feet, you head to grab the torch and head down the passage
